an4.131:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani appahinani honti, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani honti, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani honti.
an4.131:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani honti, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani honti, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani honti.
an4.131:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani honti, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani honti, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani honti.
an4.131:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani honti, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani honti, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani honti.
an4.131:5.1: Katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani appahinani, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani?
an4.131:5.3: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani appahinani, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani.
an4.131:6.1: Katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani?
an4.131:6.3: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani.
an4.131:7.1: Katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani?
an4.131:7.3: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani appahinani.
an4.131:8.1: Katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani?
an4.131:8.3: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani, upapattipatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani, bhavapatilabhiyani samyojanani pahinani.
an4.131:8.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
